## blockRendering.RenderInfo.makeSpacerRow\_() method

Create a spacer row to go between prev and next, and set its size.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected makeSpacerRow_(prev: Row, next: Row): SpacerRow;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prev | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering.row.md) | The previous row. |
|  next | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering.row.md) | The next row. |

**Returns:**

[SpacerRow](./blockly.blockrendering.spacerrow.md)

The newly created spacer row.
